participant_2.background:
I've been in my fair share of fights, but I'm not proud of it.
i like to go out to eat.
I met the love of my life while working at the hospital.
I like cooking homemade meals to balance out my fast food eating habit.
i have 3 brothers.

content.text: Hello there! How was your day?
Hello! My day was good, thanks! I worked at the hospital and then went out to eat.
Oh nice! I love to go out to eat! What restaurant did you go to?
We went to a new restaurant called The Abbey. It was really good!
Oh, I have heard good things about that place! I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch The Repair Shop and go for walks in the park. I also like to cook homemade meals.
Oh nice! I like cooking too, but I usually just order fast food.
I used to do that too, but I found that cooking homemade meals is actually a lot easier and cheaper.
That's true! I'll have to start cooking more.
You should! It's really fun and rewarding.
I will! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to cook pasta dishes. My favorite is a pesto pasta with sun-dried tomatoes and pine nuts.
Oh that sounds delicious! I'll have to try that sometime.
You should! It's really easy to make.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
